development.//serverPort: Used for local development only. Port number for the server started for local development when running yarn dev and related scripts.
development.//serverConfig: The URL that your application's manifest will be retrieved from. For local development work, make sure to use the the same port number as specified in serverPort
development.//electronDebug: Whether to start the finsemble-electron-adapter in debug mode. Default: true.
development.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause finsemble-electron-adapter when it starts. Default: false.
development.//socketCertificate: Uncomment the two lines below to provide custom socket certificate files for FinsembleTransport. Paths must be relative to the finsemble-seed directory.

production.//serverPort: Used for local development only. Port number for the server started for local development when running yarn dev and related scripts.
production.//serverConfig: The URL that your application's manifest will be retrieved from. For local development work, make sure to use the the same port number as specified in serverPort
production.//electronDebug: Whether to start the finsemble-electron-adapter in debug mode. Default: true.
production.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause finsemble-electron-adapter when it starts. Default: false.
production.//updateUrl: Url to artifacts generated by npm run makeInstaller:prod. The contents of the folder are compared to the user's current installation, and downloaded if they represent a newer version. Default is http://localhost:3375/pkg
production.//chromiumFlags: set a chromium command line flag in Finsemble Electron Adapter
production.//socketCertificate: Uncomment the two lines below to provide custom socket certificate files for FinsembleTransport. Paths must be relative to the finsemble-seed directory.
